function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of mosquito-borne diseases like malaria and yellow fever due to standing water and unsanitary living conditions.","Impact":"Increased mortality and morbidity from mosquito-borne diseases.","Mitigation":"Draining standing water, larviciding, and improving sanitary living conditions.","Technologies":"Larviciding using less toxic chemicals, screening living quarters, and installing drains.","People":"Population living in areas with standing water and unsanitary living conditions.","Owner":"Sanitary officers, public health agencies, and local governments."},{"Description":"High human toxicity and ecological concerns from the use of Paris Green for larviciding.","Impact":"Health risks and ecological damage from toxic chemicals.","Mitigation":"Discontinuing the use of Paris Green and adopting less toxic chemicals applied in a targeted manner.","Technologies":"Less toxic larvicides and targeted application methods.","People":"Population exposed to Paris Green and affected ecosystems.","Owner":"Public health agencies, environmental agencies, and chemical manufacturers."}]}
